sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Form v-show=showForm :btnClass="btnClass" @showFormButton="showFormButton" />
  <BtnToggle @showFormButton="showFormButton" :btnClass="btnClass" />
</template>

<script>
import Form from "./components/form"
import BtnToggle from "./components/btnToggle"
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    Form,
    BtnToggle
  },
  data() {
    return {
      showForm: false,
      btnClass: 'btn-success'
    }
  },
  methods: {
    showFormButton() {
      this.showForm = !this.showForm
      if (this.showForm == true) {
        this.btnClass = "btn-danger"
      }
      else {
        this.btnClass = "btn-success"
      }
    }
  }

}
</script>

<style>
body {
  background-image: url('https://images.unsplash.com/32/Mc8kW4x9Q3aRR3RkP5Im_IMG_4417.jpg?crop=entropy&cs=srgb&fm=jpg&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MXxzZWFyY2h8MTV8fGJhY2tncm91bmQlMjBpbWFnZXxlbnwwfHx8fDE2ODczNjkwNjB8MA&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&q=85');
}
</style>
